summary: This endpoint is used to enter a single master key share to progress the unsealing of the Vault.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Specifies a single master key share.

parameters.name: reset
parameters.description: Specifies if previously-provided unseal keys are discarded and the unseal process is reset.

parameters.name: migrate
parameters.description: Used to migrate the seal from shamir to autoseal or autoseal to shamir.
